revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMC7004VWBR |revision=v1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/21/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |manuf_model=WG3005B 1-17 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=HEDWG3005B1-17,HEDACC2632WV2 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Conexant |cpu1_model=CX84200-11;CONEXANT, Network Processor, CX84200-11, CG2762.00 ARM, 0228 Taiwan; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F800B3BA90 |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W986432DH-6 |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header |serial= |wi1_module=SMC SMC2632W v2 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atmel |wi1_chip1_model=AT76C502A |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model=RF3000 |wi1_chip3_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip3_model=RF2948B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Complex Programmable Logic Device (CPLD);Lattice;iM4A3-32;;1; |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:04:E2 |oui_eth=00:04:E2 }} {{TagLine|Barricade Wireless Cable/DSL Broadband Router}} :[http://www.smc.com/files/AQ/MN_7004VWBR_MN_REV.pdf Manual]
"141300400100E REV:"<...> and "MADE IN TAIWAN" :is silkscreened on the board shown below. The FCC photos show the device using ADM5106. {{see also|SMC SMC2632W v2|Accton}} The '''Conexant''' CX84200-11, is, however, equivalent :(if not 100% identical..) to the ADM5106. The default SSID may be '''default'''. By default, there is :no password for the Web configuration interface.
==Images== <gallery caption="internal [[User:RayKnight|RayKnight]]'s unit"> File:SMC7004VWBR.JPG|main board </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
